body:
Only full specialization is allowed for function templates in C++11. Partial specialization is only allowed for class templates.
http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/partial_specialization
body_html:
Only full specialization is allowed for function templates in C++11. Partial specialization is only allowed for class templates.
http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/partial_specialization
